mapper.select: SELECT MIMS.COMPANY_CD , MIMS.DIVISION_CD , MIMS.WAREHOUSE_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_WAREHOUSE_NAME(MIMS.COMPANY_CD, MIMS.DIVISION_CD,MIMS.WAREHOUSE_CD) FROM DUAL) AS WAREHOUSE_NM , MIMS.ITEM_ID , MIN(MI.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM , MIN(MI.ITEM_SPEC) AS ITEM_SPEC , MIN(MI.ITEM_TYPE) AS ITEM_TYPE , MIN((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MIMS.COMPANY_CD, MIMS.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL)) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MIMS.UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MIMS.COMPANY_CD, MIMS.DIVISION_CD, MIMS.UOM) FROM DUAL) AS UOM_NM , MIN(MIMS.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH) AS CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH , SUM(MIMS.BEGIN_QTY) AS BEGIN_QTY , SUM(MIMS.IN_QTY) AS IN_QTY , SUM(MIMS.OUT_QTY) AS OUT_QTY , SUM(MIMS.END_QTY) AS END_QTY , MIMS.WAREHOUSE_CD || '_' || MIMS.ITEM_ID || '_' || MIMS.UOM AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_ITEM_INOUT_MONTHLY_SUMMARY MIMS , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_WAREHOUSE MWH WHERE MIMS.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MIMS.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MIMS.COMPANY_CD = MWH.COMPANY_CD AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = MWH.DIVISION_CD AND MIMS.WAREHOUSE_CD = MWH.WAREHOUSE_CD AND MIMS.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIMS.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH = #{closeYearMonth, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY MIMS.COMPANY_CD , MIMS.DIVISION_CD , MIMS.WAREHOUSE_CD , MIMS.ITEM_ID , MIMS.UOM
